name: Trojans Attack!
description:
Trojans Attack! - a simulation of a handheld game.

Your soldiers and enemy soldiers run towards the castle. Let enemy soldiers fall into the moat, while allowing your soldiers to enter the castle by lowering the drawbridge (right button). When trojan horses appear, soldiers will try to enter the castle from the horse's neck. Use your spear (left button) to attack enemy soldiers from above.

FEATURES:
- High scores via Game Center
- Soldiers, trojan horses, castles
- Insane castle invasion action
- Zoom option
